thread.title: British gaming firm launches world's first online game co-created by players

title: British gaming firm launches world's first online game co-created by players
text:
British gaming firm launches world's first online game co-created by players 10:06pm IST - 02:08
World's Adrift, a highly anticipated multiplayer exploration and adventure simulation game, goes on sale in a bid by British game maker Bossa Studios to develop a massive fantasy universe built by game players themselves. Kate King reports
